WorkItem.Description:
Not sure it would qualify as an issue.. But, never the less..
Sorted after DPS, loaded my char from Armory. (Mage)
 
Encircling Burnished Gold Chains = 106,53
Chain of Latent Energies = 99,03
 
I feel Chain of Latent Energies should be rated higher as it has the same SP, 9 more hit AND 36 Haste instead of 34 Spirit (which as a mage is not exactly a stat i try to stack)
 
In my book the Chain of Latent Energies blows the Burnished Gold Chains out of the water, but maybe I missed something crucial.. A setting of some sort, or just a general brain malfunction on my part..

Comments.Message: If you're going OOM, the 36 haste is worthless, and the 34spr is very valuable. Most likely, that's what's happening. Make sure you're correctly enabling all available buffs, and setting fight parameters in the Options tab.
